DOC.brief_summary: This is a multi-centric translational study with biological samples collection. The aim of this study is to validate a method to detect BRAFV600 in blood samples. Samples: Blood from patients with BRAFV600 metastatic melanoma collected following standard medical practice. The treatment is not the aim of the study. Patients can be treated either with specific or no-specific drug.
DOC.brief_title: Translational Study for BRAFV600 Serum and Plasma Determination in Patients With BRAFV600 Metastatic Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis of melanoma and BRAFV600 Signed Informed Consent Form Unresectable phase III or phase IV melanoma The patients should be starting a treatment for melanoma (either first line or subsequent lines)
